func.title: GetBackTexture

param.name: x
param.desc: X coordinate at which to check the background texture. Offset in local calls.

param.name: y
param.desc: Y coordinate at which to check the background texture. Offset in local calls.

func.desc: Returns the name of the texture used for the background material at the given position. The background material is the material that a pixel is replaced with when it is digged away or blasted free.
